timeline.bodyText:
We are in the process of moving this kind of stuff out of configs and into tags.
Please adapt this old code to the new format.

replies.bodyText: I thought about this, but we got blocks and positions here + this here is important for servers to be backwards compatible. I can add a todo for 1.17 though.

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure if we really want to move these block permission exceptions stuff really over to tags
